name: Vegetarian Fajitas
description: These vegetarian fajitas make the perfect weeknight meal for the whole family. They're super easy to make, packed with flavor and protein, and they're completely vegan. All you need is 20 minutes!

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the bell peppers and the red onion into thin slices. Finely chop the garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the bell peppers and the red onion into thin slices. Finely chop the garlic.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a large pan. Sauté the onion and the garlic for 4 minutes. Then add the spices and cook for another minute. Stir constantly.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat the olive oil in a large pan. Sauté the onion and the garlic for 4 minutes. Then add the spices and cook for another minute. Stir constantly.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the bell pepper and cook for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add the bell pepper and cook for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the black beans and rinse well. Add to the pan and cook for another 5 minutes. Season with salt, black pepper, and lime juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the black beans and rinse well. Add to the pan and cook for another 5 minutes. Season with salt, black pepper, and lime juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the tortilla wraps in a pan without oil (20-30 seconds on each side).
recipeInstructions.name: Heat the tortilla wraps in a pan without oil (20-30 seconds on each side).

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the avocado into thin slices. Place the fajitas on the tortillas and top them with the sliced avocado, vegan sour cream (optional), and sprinkle with freshly chopped cilantro and red pepper flakes. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the avocado into thin slices. Place the fajitas on the tortillas and top them with the sliced avocado, vegan sour cream (optional), and sprinkle with freshly chopped cilantro and red pepper flakes. Enjoy!

keywords: vegan fajitas, vegetable fajitas, vegetarian fajitas
